statements: DELETE FROM customer_support_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint' AND interaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer_support_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100 AND interaction_content LIKE '%refund%';
DELETE FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100 AND interaction_type = 'Email';
DELETE FROM interaction_trends WHERE trend_name = 'Customer Retention' AND trend_timeframe < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_id = 100 AND customer_id = 500;
DELETE FROM interaction_trends WHERE trend_name = 'Sales' OR trend_name = 'Marketing';
DELETE FROM support_agents WHERE agent_role = 'Support Manager';
DELETE FROM support_agents WHERE agent_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_location = 'New York';
